items.title: Stocks to Watch Today: NHPC, United Spirits, Aster DM Healthcare, GSFC, Gland Pharma, KPR Mills, Dixon Tech, IRCON, Nazara Tech in focus on 21 May
items.description: Stocks to Watch, 21 May: Stocks like Gland Pharma, Dixon Technologies, KPR Mills, IRCON International, Nazara Technologies, Edelweiss Financial Services, Protean eGov Technologies, Axiscades Technologies, Accretion Pharmaceuticals, NHPC, United Spirits, Aster DM Healthcare, and Gujarat State Fertilizers & Chemicals will be in focus on May 21.

items.title: Asian stocks gain, oil rises on Israel-Iran report
items.description: Benchmarks in Australia, South Korea and Japan all climbed, pushing a gauge of Asian shares 0.4% higher in early trade.

items.title: KPR Mill shares fall 6% after 3.2 percent equity changes hands in block trades, promoters likely sellers
items.description: KPR Mills' promoters, Chairman KP Ramasamy, and Managing Directors KPD Sigamani and P Nataraj are likely the sellers in the block trades.

items.title: Bharat Electronics shares rise 3% as brokerages optimistic on Q4 show; should you buy, sell, or hold?
items.description: Bharat Electronics posted an 18.4 percent increase in consolidated net profit to Rs 2,127 crore for the January-March FY2025 period.

items.title: Dixon shines in Q4 with blockbuster growth numbers
items.description: Backward integration, improving wallet share, and new product development will be key growth drivers

items.title: Agri Picks Report May 21, 2025: Geojit Financial Services
items.description: According to Geojit Financial Services, The sowing of summer crops across India progressed to 8.07 million hectares as of Friday, up nearly 12% from 7.21 million hectares a year ago, according to data released by the agriculture ministry Monday.

items.title: Taking Stock | Sensex, Nifty snap 3-day losing streak as pharma, IT stocks shine
items.description: The broader market, represented by the Midcap 100 and Smallcap 100 indices, rose 0.8 and 0.4 percent, respectively.

items.title: Defence stocks surge up to 5%, index snaps two-day losing streak; BEL, Solar Industries among top gainers
items.description: The rise in the defence shares also comes amid an overall uptrend in the market, with benchmark indices Sensex and Nifty snapping a three-day losing streak

items.title: Live: Nifty breaks 3-day loss, mounts above 24,800 | Closing Bell
items.description: Markets Snap 3-day Loss. Sensex Up 400 Pts In A Choppy Session. Nifty Reclaims 24,800-mark. All Sectors In The Positive Territory. Nifty Pharma, Realty Indices Lead Charge. Mid, Smallcaps Rise After A Day's Pause. Nifty 50 Gainers: Bel, Cipla, Bajaj Finserv. Nifty 50 Laggards: Indusind, Jsw Steel, Kotak Bank .Catch Lovisha Darad and Yatin Mota as they discuss stocks on their radar.
